title: Why does my Pixel 3a say I have a limited connection?
content:
Whenever I try and use my internet it will say limited connection which prevents me from using the internet at all. This is weird because I have a very strong internet connection and it says my internet strength is excellent. 

Also, this is only happening to my phone and not any other devices in my household.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3a XL
